entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow this morning then to flurries this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
